I believe that Qh2 is the best move in this position. This move not only maintains the material advantage gained by capturing the rook on e7, but it also puts pressure on the black king and opens up the possibility of a queen and rook battery on the seventh rank. This could potentially lead to a checkmate or a forced exchange of queens, further solidifying the white's advantage. Additionally, Qh2 is a more aggressive move compared to Qxe7+, which simply repeats the position. In a game where every move counts, it is important to constantly put pressure on the opponent and maintain the initiative. Therefore, I believe that Qh2 is the best move in this position.
